website_summaries.verdict: The PSB M4U 8 headphones deliver a strong audio experience and solid noise cancellation, but are priced higher than the leading model in the category.
pros: Powerful bass depth and sculpted, bright highs
Can be used in passive wired mode

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but not as comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound and Bluetooth functionality. A bit heavy compared with Bose QC 35 II. The main drawback for me is that there’s too much clamping force on my ears. The cups are a bit shallow so they put pressure on my ears, and my ears are small. The Bose by comparison are almost like wearing nothing. These PSB headphones are superior in sound, but the Bose are far more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Doshi

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, tight head fit
customer_reviews.text: Great noise cancellation and pretty good sound in wireless mode, easy pairing and no drops. I returned them solely because of fit, I have a large head and fit was pretty tight and uncomfortable with time, their fit was similar to NAD 50, which sounded great but had a very tight headband for me. I actually really liked phones, just the fit was not good
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is outstanding. Balanced sound from lows to highs. After trying three other similarly priced headphones this one had so much better sound and unlike one other good sounding one this was easily paired and stable. Note: one thing it doesn't have is bells and whistles like Alexa control, app, etc. Read review in Absolute Sound for more info.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sound Quality, Average Noise Cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Best sound quality for wireless headphones on the market. Great soundstage. Average noise cancelling. Comfortable for me to wear. Good build quality. Battery life so so but comes with rechargeable batteries so not a big deal. If sound quality is most important to you, these are the cans to get. I love them. If the quality of the recording is good, I Close my eyes and feel like I am at a live performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Galowich

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality Superb
customer_reviews.text: Very amazing sound. Liked everything about them. The sound quality is the best thing. Superior to Bose I feel.
customer_reviews.author: Frank E. Stachitus

customer_reviews.title: Balanced sound
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenally balanced sound, very close to the ideal balance for the Harman Around-the-Ear/Over-the-Ear Target
customer_reviews.author: Roger Rozanski

customer_reviews.text: These headphones are good but they are inferior in quality to M4U2.
customer_reviews.author: ARTIOM

customer_reviews.title: They sound amazing and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They sound amazing and very comfortable. Build quality could have been better. But definitely an improvement over my m4u2’s. All buttons work well but somehow “back or prev track “ slider button doesn’t work properly. It doesn’t comes back to its original position. While the same button for track forwarding works well. Headphones and the case are both slimmer in profile in comparison to m4u2 ‘s. Just got the replacement piece. Track rewind button seems to be working fine on this. Thanks amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Satish Singh

customer_reviews.title: These don't sound good. You are better of with the Wh 1000xmk2 ...
customer_reviews.text: These don't sound good. You are better of with the Wh 1000xmk2 and paring with Power Amp build 709 and an LDAC compatible phone.
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Dad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to own theses and have quite a few decent headphones which cost a lot more than these but I am a big fan of PSB and these have not let me down, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Lee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones - bought to replace a pair of ageing ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones - bought to replace a pair of ageing Audio Technica's and the difference is just phenomonal - not cheap by any means but absolutely superb!
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Home run product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. The controls on the side are so smart and intuitive. I bought these from a different source than Amazon but felt it was worth the review. I had their M4U2 headphones and loved those but given the purity approach of the company, never thought they'd make a non-wired headphone. I'm glad they did. The fit is perfection. I have the Bose QC wireless and find those to move around a little. These stay put. The sound quality and room feel technology are just epic. The noise cancellation is definitely better than the Bose QC. Love these all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding headphones. They are comfortable, and the sound quality is amazing. You can adjust the volume from your blue tooth device, too, with a switch on the headphones. The noise cancelling is highly effective. I really like the accessories it comes with, too. You can easily use these on an airplane with the included adapter cord -- so these are both wireless and wired in one convenient package! It also has a nice carry case, and larger stereo adapter, too, for those who still have large home systems. I'd never heard of this brand before, but learned it's been around for about 2 decades, and is known for quality. Buy these with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyC

customer_reviews.title: They need to break in
customer_reviews.text: As a radio professional, I've grown accustomed to wired studio headphones. When you first try these on they may struck me as a bit base heavy. I've found like most headphones there is a break-in period where the drivers relax and more range comes out. Overall I rank the sound quality of these as the middle of the road. They don't feel or sound "cheap" but they also aren't as nice sounding as some studio headphones I've tried for a few hundred dollars LESS. For convenience, wireless and If you aren't a hardcore audiophile, you will be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce and Kathy O'Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Loving these
customer_reviews.text: OK, so these can be worn wireless or plugged in. They work great and sound great. They fit well and the noise cancellation is amazing. the quality of the sound is great. they look nice and are very cool. They are high end and you can tell by the quality of the sound and all the controls. It was easy to set up and pair and use. Awesome headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bailey

product_meta.title: PSB M4U 8 Wireless Active Noise Cancelling Headphones
product_meta.description: Listen to music like never before. Comfort, style, and PSB’s true-to-nature sound quality bring you closer to the songs you love. It’s like the music is meant just for you. Created to deliver the clear, natural sound of a live performance, PSB’s exclusive RoomFeel technology adds layers of lush realism to all your favourite recordings. Carefully developed to produce ‘Room Gain’ – the energy and clarity that a room adds when listening to high-quality loudspeakers. RoomFeel places the music seemingly around the listener, resulting in a truly stunning musical experience. Designed to go wherever you and your music go, RoomFeel brings the most accurate sound directly to your headphones. The M4U 8 model allows you to listen to music wirelessly with Bluetooth aptX HD – the latest 24-bit high definition version of the most universal wireless technology – the high fidelity version of Bluetooth. There are also two different wired modes of operation; 3.5mm wired connection, or via USB from the computer, which recharges the batteries for wireless operation. Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) is remarkably sophisticated and effective, utilizing 4 microphones (others use only 2) which offer a ‘listen through mode’ allowing you to momentarily listen to the outside world as well as the ability to answer your connected phone. There is also an Active Mode, and Passive Mode (without batteries). Listen all day and all night with up to 15 hours of run time in Bluetooth or Active modes. When you’re out of batteries, switch to Passive Mode without missing a beat. Listen longer in extra comfort. Our unique two-way adjustable ear pads are gyro-suspended for optimal ergonomics and supreme comfort. Super soft ear pads and light weight make these wireless headphones “disappear”, leaving only rich, detailed sound. The expandable headband also easily adjusts for a more customized fit. Don’t let anything come between you and your music.
feature_bullets: Wireless amplified, tri-mode, closed back design
Bluetooth HD wireless connection with aptX and NFC (automatic connection)
Active Noise Cancelling Mode with RoomFeel
Unique dual input connections (left or right)
